scripts.backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv 2>/dev/null || true && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r ../requirements.txt && flask --app brilliance.api.v1:app run --port 5000
scripts.backend:custom: cd backend && python -m venv venv 2>/dev/null || true && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r ../requirements.txt && env REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:5050 flask --app brilliance.api.v1:app run --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5050
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm start
scripts.frontend:custom: cd frontend && npm install && env REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:5050 npm start
